title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
summary: Implement secure login with MFA for customers accessing the portal.
description: Design and develop a robust authentication system supporting username, password, and multi-factor authentication methods like OTP or authenticator apps. Ensure secure session management, password recovery, and integration with existing identity systems. This epic will form the foundation for secure user access into the customer portal.

title: Responsive User Interface and User Experience Design
summary: Create a modern, responsive, and intuitive interface for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Develop a user-friendly and visually appealing front-end interface optimized for multiple devices. Ensure consistency in layout, navigation, and branding. Focus on simplifying user flows to minimize clicks and improve accessibility across platforms. Provide design guidelines for future scalability and accessibility compliance.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Banking Product Display
summary: Develop a personalized dashboard with relevant products and services for each user.
description: Implement a dashboard that dynamically displays banking products, account details, and personalized offers based on user profiles and eligibility criteria. Include widgets for quick actions and performance metrics. Integrate the dashboard with backend services to ensure accurate and timely data display.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable account opening and service modification through intuitive, low-click workflows.
description: Build digital forms and workflow automation to handle new account requests, modifications to existing services, and other user-driven actions. Reduce friction through intelligent pre-filling, validations, and guided steps. Integrate workflows with back-office systems to expedite request processing.

title: Real-Time Status and Notifications Engine
summary: Provide real-time updates and email notifications for customer requests.
description: Implement a notification and status tracking module that updates customers on the progress of their account opening and service requests. Support multiple notification channels including email and in-portal messages. Ensure customers can track complete timelines of their interactions with the bank.

title: Document Upload and Application Save/Resume Functionality
summary: Allow users to upload documents and resume incomplete applications.
description: Develop functionality for users to securely upload required documentation for account or service requests. Enable users to save incomplete forms and return later to resume from where they left off. Ensure file validation, virus scanning, and sensitive information masking for online document handling.

title: Integration with Core Banking System and Internal APIs
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking system.
description: Implement seamless integration with the bank’s core systems to fetch and update customer data in real time. Ensure secure, high-performance APIs for data exchange while maintaining the portal’s separate database for optimal performance and resilience. Establish error handling and synchronization mechanisms.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Management
summary: Implement RBAC to control access based on user profile and authorization level.
description: Design and deploy a robust role-based access control mechanism ensuring that users can view and access only the features suited to their profile and authorization. Manage roles for customers, admins, and service agents with granular permission levels. Maintain audit trails for all access activities.

title: Security, Data Privacy, and Audit Logging
summary: Ensure data protection, privacy compliance, and full audit trails across all activities.
description: Establish strong data encryption, secure storage mechanisms, and comply with relevant financial data protection regulations. Implement audit logs to track critical system and user activities. Continuously monitor for anomalies and enforce strict compliance with internal and external security standards.

title: Interaction History and Reporting Module
summary: Maintain comprehensive history and reporting of all customer interactions.
description: Create a reporting and history management system that captures all user activities, submitted requests, approvals, and communications. Present historical data in user-friendly formats with filtering and export capabilities. Enable staff to review and audit customer interactions when necessary.
